General.Name: Barrel Co. Ltd
General.Description: Barrel Co., Ltd provides clothing products in South Korea. It provides men, women, and kids clothing products; lifestyle wear; fit tops and bottoms; yoga accessories; neoprene products; water sports tops and bottoms; kids products; bags; shoes; hats; sunglasses; and other products. The company also offers products through online and offline stores. Barrel Co., Ltd was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
